nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 6: Arkanian Legacy

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 6 is an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on October 16, 2008 and is a sixth in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article covers the ship Arkanian Legacy.
